testcase.name: Verify that a user can click on "Stress reduzieren" navigation link and can see sub-options
testcase.system-out: Given The user navigate to novoDaily website................................passed And accept the cookie.......................................................passed Then wait for the homepage to load for 5 seconds............................passed When hovers over the Deine Ziele menu.......................................passed And click on the "Stress reduzieren" tab to open it in a separate tab.......passed Then scroll down til "Abnehmen" navigate-link is visible....................passed And click on the "Stress reduzieren" navigate-link..........................passed And verify that the "Outdoor-Yoga" font is displayed........................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
